name: YOU are the power-up
description:
You are a power-up and you've had enough of it! How many times will heroes pick you up and get all the benefits of your power without as much as a simple "thank you"? 

Enough is enough! NO ONE will be picking you up from now on.

Use left and right arrow or A, D keys to strafe, and SPACE to jump over!

Developed in ~3 hours for Trijam #154
Font: Atmospheric by wep

Background music by WOW sound
